ygData.subject: Re: MESH / NETTED ARMOUR
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Excellent; thanks.  Some of the guides I ve read say the swamp is for 1-10 only, which discouraged me, but I ll run down there. Are groups hard to find, or
ygData.messageBody:
Steve Heath writes:

> The swamp is fantastic if you watch out for Lynunga, the Troll
> Slayer, the Troll Captain, and all the Troll Guards, they'll KOS ya.
> However, the swamp has TONS of froglocks (watch out for mobs and
> trains) ranging from newbie at the far end of the swamp from where
> you enter to froglock foragers and kobold hunters where you come in.
> Then, after you hit about 15th level, go deep into guk and get the
> good stuff.

Excellent; thanks. Some of the guides I've read say the swamp is for
1-10 only, which discouraged me, but I'll run down there.

Are groups hard to find, or should I just try to solo it?
